subject: Enter for a chance to win
body:
Easy to operate and engineered to meet the demands of high-volume office environments. Intelligent network features help maintain an uninterrupted workflow. All aboard for high performance printing!      Learn about the Phaser 6360 Network Color Printer   PERFORMANCE: Up to 42 ppm color Fastest in its class 100,000 page duty cycle  INTELLIGENCE: Usage analysis tools Network security enabled Convenient email alerts Online troubleshooting  WARRANTY: One-year onsite Total satisfaction guarantee         This email includes advertising or promotional content.  The warranty statement provided with this product may not apply if you purchase your product under a PagePack, eClick, or other written agreement or purchase plan. Please see your specific agreement or contact your Xerox Account Manager for complete details about your warranty as it may be subject to certain restrictions.
